>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="in-text"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout prefix="(" suffix=")">
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <names font-style="italic" suffix="!" variable="author">
          <name />
        </names>
        <date variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year" />
        </date>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
